Talon:

Talon smiled, she didnt expected that her babies got so much attent=
ion and care. She ate a bit of the remained fish, she looked a little tired=
. The babies were deeply sleeping and purring. 

"Do you think that they ca=
n eat energon as us?" said Talon to Straightshot "Or do we have to feed the=
m with organig food?"
